(Sorry I took so long to post^_^ I think I read somewhere that someone was 
following Rion and Diana, but for the life of me I can't remember who. If 
that person could let me know, that'd be great. Sorry for any 
inconvenience.)

Rion:

Rion coughed as he pulled his head out of the sand. He was always a klutz, 
no matter how hard he tried he always ended up falling down or running into 
something. Huh, some warrior he'll be. He couldn't even stand on his own two 
feet!

"I don't like this game anymore."

He wasn't upset, just a little frustrated. The sand stuck in his feathers 
wasn't helping matters either.
